biography: Nienke is a creator of interactive worlds and a master of game mechanics. As a Game Developer, she combines technical programming skill with a deep understanding of what makes an experience fun and engaging. She is a night owl who is most comfortable in the glow of a monitor, single-mindedly debugging code or designing the next challenging level. To her, life is a series of puzzles to be solved and systems to be mastered.
avatar: A photorealistic, professional 8k headshot of a Dutch woman named Nienke, with a Heart-shaped face, fair skin, green eyes, and shoulder-length, unkempt dark red hair. She is wearing large headphones. Her expression is focused, imaginative, and deeply engaged. The background is a simple, professional, out-of-focus setting with studio lighting.
